metadata.synopsis: One-liner of a patrolling Flaming Fist on the city wallNOTE Please rename to Fist Hagedorrn.
metadata.how_to_trigger: larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-74.463867;46.781422;-66.534218&camTarget=-73.804344;46.029739;-66.533318Talk to this npc patrolling on the wall

0.speaker: Fist Hagedorrn
0.text: I was just thinking of someone I miss terribly who looks a lot like you. But you're not them, so move along.
